label: Session Name
description: The name of your server as shown in the server browser.

label: Server Map
description: The map to use for this server instance. Select from common maps or enter a custom map name.

label: Max Players
description: The maximum number of players allowed on the server at once.

label: Server Password
description: Players must enter this password to join your server. Leave blank for no password.

label: Admin Password
description: Required to use admin commands in-game. Keep this private.

label: Enable Whitelist
description: Enable exclusive join mode - only whitelisted players can join the server. Uses PlayersExclusiveJoinList.txt file.

label: Crossplay Platforms
description: Select all platforms that should be able to join this server. Only players on the selected platforms will be able to connect.

label: Launch Arguments
description: Extra command-line arguments passed to the server on startup. Use for mod parameters like -MapModID=, -TotalConversionMod=, or other custom flags. Separate multiple arguments with spaces.

label: XP Multiplier
description: Multiplier for experience gain. Higher values = faster leveling, lower values = slower leveling.

label: Override Official Difficulty
description: Overrides the official difficulty value for the server.

label: Difficulty
description: Controls dino level and loot quality. Higher values increase difficulty.

label: Taming Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for taming speed. Higher values = faster taming, lower values = slower taming.

label: Egg Hatch Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly eggs hatch. Higher values = faster hatching, lower values = slower hatching.

label: Baby Mature Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly babies mature. Higher values = faster maturation, lower values = slower maturation.

label: Mating Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the time between allowed mating. Higher values = longer wait times, lower values = shorter wait times.

label: Lay Egg Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the time between egg laying. Higher values = longer intervals between eggs, lower values = shorter intervals.

label: Mating Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for mating speed. Higher values = faster mating, lower values = slower mating.

label: Baby Food Consumption Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly babies consume food. Higher values = more food needed, lower values = less food needed.

label: Baby Cuddle Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the time between baby cuddles. Higher values = longer intervals, lower values = shorter intervals.

label: Baby Imprinting Stat Scale Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much imprinting affects stats. Higher values = stronger imprint bonuses, lower values = weaker imprint bonuses.

label: Baby Cuddle Grace Period Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the grace period after a missed cuddle. Higher values = longer grace period, lower values = shorter grace period.

label: Baby Cuddle Lose Imprint Quality Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly imprint quality is lost after a missed cuddle. Higher values = faster imprint loss, lower values = slower imprint loss.

label: Baby Imprint Amount Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the amount of imprinting per cuddle. Higher values = more imprint per cuddle, lower values = less imprint per cuddle.

label: Baby Max Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the maximum allowed interval between baby cuddles. Higher values = longer max intervals, lower values = shorter max intervals.

label: Harvest Amount Multiplier
description: Multiplier for resource harvest amount. Higher values = more resources per harvest, lower values = fewer resources per harvest.

label: Dino Harvesting Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage dinos do to harvestable resources. Higher values = more resources from dino harvesting, lower values = fewer resources.

label: Player Harvesting Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage players do to harvestable resources. Higher values = more resources from player harvesting, lower values = fewer resources.

label: Resources Respawn Period Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly resources respawn after being harvested. Higher values = slower respawn, lower values = faster respawn.

label: Crop Growth Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly crops grow. Higher values = faster crop growth, lower values = slower crop growth.

label: Crop Decay Speed Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly crops decay. Higher values = faster decay, lower values = slower decay.

label: Player Food Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly players get hungry. Higher values = get hungry faster, lower values = get hungry slower.

label: Player Stamina Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly players use stamina. Higher values = stamina drains faster, lower values = stamina drains slower.

label: Player Health Recovery Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly players recover health. Higher values = faster health recovery, lower values = slower health recovery.

label: Player Water Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly players get thirsty. Higher values = get thirsty faster, lower values = get thirsty slower.

label: Player Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage players deal. Higher values = more damage dealt, lower values = less damage dealt.

label: Player Resistance Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage players resist. Higher values = more damage resistance, lower values = less damage resistance.

label: Dino Food Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly dinos get hungry. Higher values = dinos get hungry faster, lower values = dinos get hungry slower.

label: Dino Stamina Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly dinos use stamina. Higher values = dino stamina drains faster, lower values = dino stamina drains slower.

label: Dino Health Recovery Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly dinos recover health. Higher values = faster dino health recovery, lower values = slower dino health recovery.

label: Dino Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage dinos deal. Higher values = more damage dealt by dinos, lower values = less damage dealt by dinos.

label: Dino Resistance Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage dinos resist. Higher values = more damage resistance for dinos, lower values = less damage resistance for dinos.

label: Day Cycle Speed Scale
description: Multiplier for the length of a full day/night cycle. Higher values = shorter cycles (faster time), lower values = longer cycles (slower time).

label: Day Time Speed Scale
description: Multiplier for the length of daytime. Higher values = shorter days (faster daytime), lower values = longer days (slower daytime).

label: Night Time Speed Scale
description: Multiplier for the length of nighttime. Higher values = shorter nights (faster nighttime), lower values = longer nights (slower nighttime).

label: Fuel Consumption Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly fuel is consumed by structures. Higher values = fuel lasts longer, lower values = fuel consumed faster.

label: Global Spoiling Time Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly items spoil globally. Higher values = items spoil slower, lower values = items spoil faster.

label: Supply Crate Loot Quality Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the quality of loot found in supply crates. Higher values = better loot quality, lower values = worse loot quality.

label: Fishing Loot Quality Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the quality of loot obtained from fishing. Higher values = better fishing rewards, lower values = worse fishing rewards.

label: Structure Resistance Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage structures resist. Higher values = structures take less damage, lower values = structures take more damage.

label: Structure Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage structures deal. Higher values = structures deal more damage, lower values = structures deal less damage.

label: Override Structure Platform Prevention
description: Allows structures on platforms that are normally prevented.

label: Force All Structure Locking
description: Forces all structures to be locked by default.

label: Disable Structure Placement Collision
description: Disables collision checks when placing structures.

label: Disable Structure Decay PvE
description: Disables structure decay in PvE mode.

label: Enable Extra Structure Prevention Volumes
description: Enables extra volumes that prevent structure placement.

label: Per Platform Max Structures Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the maximum number of structures allowed on platform saddles. Higher values = more structures on platforms.

label: Platform Saddle Build Area Bounds Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the build area size on platform saddles. Higher values = larger buildable area.

label: Max Platform Saddle Structure Limit
description: Maximum number of structures that can be placed on a single platform saddle.

label: Max Gate Frames On Saddles
description: Maximum number of gate frames allowed on platform saddles.

label: Structure Prevent Resource Radius Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how far structures prevent resources from spawning. Higher values = larger no-resource zone around structures.

label: Structure Pickup Time After Placement
description: Time in seconds after placement during which a structure can be picked up.

label: Structure Pickup Hold Duration
description: Duration in seconds to hold the pickup button to pick up a structure.

label: Allow Integrated S+ Structures
description: Enables the S+ (Structures Plus) integrated structures functionality.

label: Allow Platform Saddle Stacking
description: Allows stacking structures on platform saddles beyond normal limits.

label: Allow Cave Building PvE
description: Allows building inside caves on PvE servers.

label: Auto Destroy Old Structures Multiplier
description: Multiplier for auto-destroying old structures. Set to 0 to disable. Higher values = faster auto-destroy.

label: Max Structures In Range
description: Maximum number of structures allowed within a certain range. Prevents excessive structure spam.

label: PvE Platform Structure Damage Ratio
description: Multiplier for damage to structures built on platforms in PvE mode.

label: PvE Mode
description: Enable Player vs Environment mode (no PvP combat).

label: Show Floating Damage Text
description: Shows floating damage numbers when dealing or receiving damage.

label: Allow Third Person
description: Allow players to toggle third-person camera view.

label: Disable Imprint Dino Buff
description: Disables the stat buff from imprinting on dinos.

label: PvE Disable Friendly Fire
description: Disables friendly fire in PvE mode.

label: Allow Anyone Baby Imprint Cuddle
description: Allow any player to cuddle and imprint any baby dino.

label: Use Optimized Harvesting Health
description: Enables optimized health for harvestable resources.

label: PvE Allow Tribe War
description: Allows tribe wars in PvE mode.

label: Allow Raid Dino Feeding
description: Allows feeding of raid dinos during raids.

label: Disable Friendly Fire
description: Disables friendly fire between players and tames.

label: PvE Allow Tribe War Cancel
description: Allows tribe wars to be cancelled in PvE mode.

label: Only Allow Specified Engrams
description: Restricts crafting to only specified engrams.

label: Disable Loot Crates
description: Disables loot crate drops on the map.

label: Increase PvP Respawn Interval
description: Increases the respawn interval in PvP mode.

label: Allow Multiple Attached C4
description: Allows multiple C4 charges to be attached to a target.

label: Disable Weather Fog
description: Disables weather fog effects on the map.

label: Prevent Offline PvP
description: Prevents PvP actions against offline players/tribes.

label: Allow Unlimited Respecs
description: Allows players to respec their stats unlimited times.

label: Show Creative Mode
description: Enables creative mode for all players.

label: Allow Platform Saddle Multi-Floors
description: Allows multiple floors on platform saddles.

label: Use Corpse Locator
description: Enables corpse locator for easier body recovery.

label: Use Singleplayer Settings
description: Applies singleplayer balancing to the server.

label: Flyers Ridable In Caves
description: Allows flying creatures to be ridden inside cave areas.

label: Flyers Can Carry Players In PVE
description: Allows flying creatures to pick up and carry players on PvE servers.

label: Flyer Speed Levelling
description: Allows movement speed to be leveled on flying creatures.

label: Ground Speed Levelling
description: Allows movement speed to be leveled on ground creatures.

label: Server Max Tames
description: Maximum number of tamed creatures allowed server-wide. Set to 0 for unlimited.

label: Max Tribe Tames
description: Maximum number of tamed creatures allowed per tribe/player. Set to 0 for unlimited.

label: No Creature Riding
description: When enabled, prevents players from riding any tamed creatures.

label: Auto Unlock All Engrams
description: Automatically unlocks all engrams for all players.

label: Hardcore Mode
description: Enables hardcore mode â€” players lose their character on death.

label: Global Voice Chat
description: Enables global voice chat across the entire server.

label: Proximity Chat
description: Enables proximity-based voice chat.

label: No HUD
description: Forces HUD to be disabled for all players.

label: Show Map Player Location
description: Shows player location on the in-game map.

label: Server Crosshair
description: Enables server-side crosshair for all players.

label: Allow Hit Markers
description: Enables visual hit markers when dealing damage.

label: Admin Logging
description: Logs all admin commands to chat and server logs.

label: Enable PVP Gamma
description: Allows players to adjust gamma in PVP mode.

label: Disable PvE Gamma
description: Prevents players from adjusting gamma in PvE mode.

label: Prevent Mate Boost
description: Disables the mate boost buff for tamed creatures.

label: Disable Imprinting
description: Completely disables the imprinting system for baby creatures.

label: Passive Defenses Damage Riderless Dinos
description: Allows passive defenses (plant species X, etc.) to damage riderless tamed dinos.

label: Auto Destroy Decayed Dinos
description: Automatically destroys tamed dinos after they have decayed.

label: Allow Custom Recipes
description: Allows players to create custom cooking recipes.

label: Clamp Resource Harvest Damage
description: Clamps the maximum harvest damage to prevent excessive resource gathering.

label: Item Stack Size Multiplier
description: Multiplier for item stack sizes. Higher values allow more items per stack.

label: Max Number Of Players In Tribe
description: Maximum number of players allowed in a single tribe. Set to 0 for unlimited.

label: Kick Idle Players Period
description: Seconds before idle players are kicked. Set to 0 to disable.

label: Auto Save Period (Minutes)
description: How often in minutes the server auto-saves. Set to 0 to disable.

label: Prevent Offline PvP Interval
description: Seconds before offline PvP protection activates after all tribe members log off.

label: Custom Recipe Effectiveness Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the effectiveness of custom recipes.

label: Custom Recipe Skill Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the crafting skill bonus applied to custom recipes.

label: Dino Turret Damage Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how much damage turrets deal to creatures.

label: Oviraptor Egg Consumption Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly Oviraptors consume eggs.

label: Passive Tame Interval Multiplier
description: Multiplier for the interval between passive tame feeding. Lower values = more frequent feeding allowed.

label: Tamed Creature Food Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly tamed creatures get hungry. Higher values = get hungry faster, lower values = get hungry slower.

label: Tamed Creature Torpor Drain Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how quickly tamed creatures lose torpor. Higher values = faster torpor drain, lower values = slower torpor drain.

label: Creature Count Multiplier
description: Multiplier for how many creatures spawn. Higher values = more creatures spawning, lower values = fewer creatures spawning.

label: Mod IDs (comma separated)
description: Enter CurseForge mod IDs, separated by commas.
